languageKey.label: The import module (categories)
About

The import module is used to import and update category data. This could e.g. come in handy if you would like to use the categories from a public taxonomy (such as the one provided by dmoz.org) instead of creating your own categories. For developers: The import module serves as a container for import / update wizards. 3rd party taxonomy vendors are invited to hook into this module and create wizards for importing and updating their taxonomy schemes. See extension categories_importipsv for an example on how to implement an import wizard.
